original: Bergman, Harald Carl Fredrik, direktör, kapten, Norrköping, f. 19/9/96 i Djursholm av rev. August K:son B. o. Hildur Åkerman. G. 29 m. Elsa Haag. — Fänrik i kustart. 18, und:-löjtn. 20, löjtn. 22 o. num. kapt. Anst. v. A-B Åkerman & Dahl i Norrköp. 23, num. inneh. av samt verkst. dir. f. föret., gen:ag. i östergötl. f. Försäkr. A-B Hansa. Stud:res. t. USA, Kanada, Engl. o. Tyskl. 20-23. Hobbies: segling, skidåkn., curling. TyskÖO, Sjöv:kårens förtj :M.
translated: Bergman, Harald Carl Fredrik, director, captain, Norrköping, born on September 19, 1896 in Djursholm to Reverend August K:son B. and Hildur Åkerman. Married to Elsa Haag in 1929. He was a ensign in the coastal artillery in 1918, second lieutenant in 1920, lieutenant in 1922 and numbered captain. Employed by A-B Åkerman & Dahl in Norrköping in 1923, numbered owner and managing director for the company, general agent in Östergötland for Försäkr. A-B Hansa. He went on study trips to the USA, Canada, England and Germany from 1920 to 1923. His hobbies included sailing, skiing and curling. He received the German Order of Merit and the Naval Corps Merit Award.

education.name: Study trips to USA, Canada, England, Germany
